column4: is there any way to reserve a small amount of resources so that it's possible to ssh into a server and still be able to issue commands when under extreme load? I've had two machines go down at the same time that have had 120+ loads that take 10 minutes for ssh to log into, then 5 minutes to come up with a command prompt and either don't respond at all or take 10+ minutes to issue commands
